title: Mega Show Bangkok 2024
description: Entering 2024, the world is witnessing a remarkable post-pandemic recovery. Social gatherings and business activities have fully resumed, and the market is optimistic. People are celebrating more, hosting more home parties, and expressing their joy and gratitude with gifts. This creates a huge demand for trending gift and home products that can enhance any space and occasion. Featuring a diverse selection of housewares, home décor, kitchenware, toys, stationery, sporting and travel goods, MEGA Gift & Home will provide a fabulous opportunity for international buyers to source trendy products at competitive prices and connect with reliable Asian suppliers at the heart of ASEAN.
ticket: ไม่มีค่าเข้าชม
